TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlStreamStore extends System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore
Public NotInheritable Class XmlStreamStore Inherits AnnotationStore

summary.span: 表示用于写入或读取用户批注的 XML 数据存储区。

span.span: Represents an XML data store for writing and reading user annotations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The I/O stream for reading and writing user annotations.

summary.span: 使用指定 I/O 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `stream` 必须是有效的 XML 格式，而且符合[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]架构。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Uri, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri>> knownNamespaces) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 用于读取和写入用户批注的 I/O 流。

span.span: The I/O stream for reading and writing user annotations.

param.name: knownNamespaces
param.span: 包含已知兼容命名空间列表的字典。

span.span: A dictionary with a list of known compatible namespaces.

summary.span: 使用指定 I/O 和已知兼容命名空间的字典初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O and dictionary of known compatible namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这构造函数可注册应用程序特定的已知命名空间。This constructor enables the registration of application-specific known namespaces. `knownNamespace`字典定义当批注的一部分存储自定义内容时使用的应用程序命名空间。The `knownNamespace` dictionary defines application namespaces that are used when you store custom content as part of an annotation. 字典的键是已知的应用程序的主命名空间。The dictionary key is the primary namespace known to the application program. 命名空间密钥是与较旧的命名空间中的"密钥"命名空间与兼容的值列表相关联。The namespace key is associated with a value list of older namespaces that are compatible with the "key" namespace. 批注从此列表中加载的所有命名空间时将替换为"密钥"命名空间。When annotations are loaded all namespaces from this list will be replaced by the "key" namespace. `stream` 必须是有效的 XML 格式，而且符合[批注架构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md)。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md).

span.span: is .
contains invalid XML.

exception.span: 字典包含重复的命名空间。

span.span: The dictionary contains a duplicate namespace.
-or-

exception.span: 字典包含具有 键的元素。

span.span: The dictionary contains an element that has a key.

span.span: if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri> GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces(class System.Uri name) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces (name As Uri) As IList(Of Uri)

param.name: name
param.span: 为其返回命名空间列表的起始 URI 序列。

span.span: The starting URI sequence to return the list of namespaces for.

summary.span: 返回与输入命名空间兼容的命名空间列表。

span.span: Returns a list of namespaces that are compatible as an input namespace.

returns.span: 与 匹配的兼容命名空间的列表；如果找不到任何兼容命名空间，则为 。

span.span: A list of compatible namespaces that match ; otherwise, if there are no compatible namespaces found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数有效仅对于预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]命名空间。The `name` parameter works only for predefined [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] namespaces. 中提供的任何其他命名空间`name`参数将返回`null`，即使是那些命名空间注册通过`knownNamespaces`参数构造函数。For any other namespace given in the `name` parameter will return `null`, even those namespaces registered through the `knownNamespaces` parameter of the constructor. 命名空间由预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base - http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoredNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ IgnoredNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取加载 XML 流时被忽略的命名空间的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

value.span: 加载 XML 流时被忽略的命名空间的列表。

span.span: The list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将永远不会返回`null`，但返回的列表能为空，如果没有命名空间将被忽略。The property will never return `null`, however the returned list can be empty if no namespaces are ignored. 当程序中读取数据批注内容由不同版本创建的 XML 标记兼容性方面的帮助[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]。 helps in XML markup compatibility when the program reads annotation content created by different versions of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]. 较旧的应用程序时提供创建使用的较新版本的批注内容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]，返回的元素和属性对旧框架未知的 XML 命名空间列表。When an older application is given annotation content created using a newer version of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)], returns a list of the XML namespaces for elements and attributes not known to the older framework. 批注内容是读取和反序列化旧应用程序时，将忽略未知的 XML 元素和属性与较新的命名空间关联。Unknown XML elements and attributes associated with newer namespaces are ignored when the annotation content is read and deserialized by the older application. 有关详细信息请参阅*XML 标记兼容性规范*在[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824)。For more information see the *XML Markup Compatibility Specification* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824).

Public Shared ReadOnly Property WellKnownNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: static property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ WellKnownNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的所有命名空间的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of all namespaces that are predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)].

value.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的所有命名空间的列表。

span.span: The list of namespaces that are predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间由预定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base - http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation
